title: Textile, 1851–63
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed
description: Two fragments, same design in different colors. A) Ground striped in blue-grey and fine tan stripes; small scale pattern of vine with grey berries. B) Same with green stripes and berries in lavendar. Glazed.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1851–63.Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave; glazed. 1967-10-5-a.
